item.title: Michelle add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "After you get stung, you can't get unstung no matter how much you whine about it." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "Nobody around here had ever seen a lady beekeeper till her. She liked to tell everybody that women made the best beekeepers, 'cause they have a special ability built into them to love creatures that sting. It comes from years of loving children and husbands." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "To avoid criticism say nothing, do nothing, be nothing." -- Aristotle

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "When I was a child, adults would tell me not to make things up, warning me of what would happen if I did. As far as I can tell so far, it seems to involve lots of foreign travel and not having to get up too early in the morning." -- Neil Gaiman
